modShortDescription: This mod sets the user up for a 60 slot backpack, with 30 slots reserved for growth through perks and items.
modDescription:
This mod sets the user up for a 60 slot [backpack](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-backpack/), with 30 slots reserved for growth through perks and items. The perk tree was adjusted to grant up to 20 more slots, leaving the last 10 for encumbrance or items.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-Bag_Bellows_Headshot/tree/master/60Slot_Bag_30Reserve)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17502-60-slot-bag-faster-bellows-25-headshot/).

**Credits:** [ShoudenKalferas](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/shoudenkalferas/)
